short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight HTML elements with a specific class or ID

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension allows developers to quickly and easily highlight HTML elements that contain a specific class or ID by changing their background color. With CSS-Highlight, you can input a class name or ID and instantly see all elements that contain that identifier highlighted on the page. This extension is perfect for front-end developers, designers, and anyone who works with CSS on a regular basis.
